profile:
Paintspecial is a company providing services throughout the lower mainland since 1994. Now serving the Fraser Valley and the Okanagan Valley. Our goal is to satisfy our customers by providing quality painting and outstanding customer service. With many years of residential and commercial painting experience, any project will be completed professionally and to the highest of quality.

***

The services that we offer consist of, free estimates for both interior and exterior projects with only the highest quality of paints. And our competitive rates and pricing provide exceptional value and savings.  We also install Laminate flooring and have Maid service.

***

Each member of our hardworking team is comprised of skilled and experienced professional painters. They are specialized in residential and commercial painting and have painted for at least 5 to 20 years. Their commitment, knowledge and experience will completely exceed your expectations, with dependable results that you can rely on.

***

We are very proud of how our business has developed and grown over the years. Let us show you everything a painting contractor should be through our complete professionalism, respect for our work, and impeccable customer service. We are here to answer your questions and will gladly provide you with any further information.

***
service_area: Throughout the Lower Mainland, Fraser Valley and the Okanagan Valley
services:
Paintspecial  offers full service painting contractors. We strive to ensure only the best of customer satisfaction and ensure that every client is fully involved with each project at hand. We are confident that after years of experience working with hotels, businesses, and property owners that you will be pleased with all of the services we have to offer.

Our collective knowledge, reliability and experience is priceless.
All of our clients are kept well informed by our job supervisors at the start and completion of the projects for their building. We make valued attempts to ensure that everything is possible to cause little if any disruption for all parties involved.

And much more.

All our Residential painting is done with the same high standard quality as we would do for our commercial residences such as Ethan Allan on Sweden way in Richmond B.C.

INTERIOR PAINTING:
1. Estimate
-Swift scheduling and appointments
-Discuss walk through of the tasks to be done
-Lead into our services
-Establish colours and needs for individual customers
-~Professional proposals faxed, emailed, or delivered~
2. Set Up

-Familiarize customer with the crew members
-Walk through areas to be painted with customer and crew manager
-Move larger furniture to center of the room and cover with plastic.
-Cover all the floors with drop cloth
-Remove all window locks, door knobs, handles, and switch plates from the trim before the prep work and painting.

* Seal areas to enclose dust

3. Prep Work

-sand and dust the Walls and trim
-Repair any holes or cracks in the wall
-Seal gaps or holes in the trim to wall
- Prime wall repair and water stain spots
4. Painting

-A brush and roll are used to paint the ceiling and walls
-Use of neat and orderly straight lines between the ceiling, trim, and walls
-Crew completes wet inspections and touch ups before they clean up

5. Clean up

-Prompt removal of all tools and equipment
-All the floors are vaccumed and swept before moving the furniture back to its original place
-All the hardware and wall fixtures are reinstated to their previous places
-Trash cans are removed
-Cans of touch up paint are labeled and left behind for future touch ups.

EXTERIOR PAINTING:
Pressure Washing

Before we begin the preparation or painting of your home, we use a pressure washer to remove any mildew or mineral deposits or dirt that has collected on your home since the last time it was painted. The mildew is pre-treated with a solution of bleach and water to destroy the mildew and remove any stains caused by it.

We remove these contaminants to ensure a proper finish coat bond. The pressure washing also helps remove loose and peeling paint. While it helps, pressure washing does not replace scraping and sanding which will be done by our painting crews.

Preparation

All tasks done prior to the painting itself. Such as scraping of any peeling paint, sanding all the bare wood areals for smoothing, sealing of the cracks and construction seams, priming the bare wood. Aesthetic sanding can also be done, however it is not a normal part of our process,it is considered to be restorative.

If its restorative sanding you
specialities:
Residential Painting, Interior Painting, Exterior Painting, and Commercial Painting, 

We offer both Residential and Commercial cleaning services.  Ask about our cleaning specials.

We service the Lower Mainland Fraser Valley and Okanagan Valley.

* Residential cleaning $25 per hour Two hour minimum. Includes Cleaning Supplies.

* Commercial Cleaning is priced by the square ft.  Pricing includes labor and materials.

*Free Estimates, all staff are bonded and insured.
